class.name: eidos::LidarKEPFactor
class.description: LiDAR Keyframe-based Edge-Plane factor. Performs deskewing, feature extraction, scan-to-map matching, and provides odometry BetweenFactor constraints.

class.name: eidos::ImuIntegrationFactor
class.description: IMU preintegration factor. Provides high-rate odometry, TF broadcasting, and CombinedImuFactor constraints.

class.name: eidos::GpsFactor
class.description: GPS factor. Provides GPSFactor/PriorFactor constraints from GNSS data.

class.name: eidos::EuclideanDistanceLoopClosureFactor
class.description: Euclidean distance-based loop closure. Detects loops via KD-tree radius search and validates with ICP alignment.
